alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 6:35PM CST until February 06 at 9:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Wolf River Above Gulfport affecting Harrison County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wolf River Above Gulfport. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Bells Ferry Road will be impassable with deep water on the east bridge approach. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 4.5 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.2 feet on 02/23/1990. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
